item.description:
One night where we mix a little bit of Hawaii with a whole lot of Boston!

Please join us for a one night event where we ask everyone to find their inner Hawaiian

spirit and join us on the Biggest Booze Cruise in Boston. On Friday, June 19th, get ready

for Boston's Biggest Luau on the Boston Harbor! DJ Danjah has committed to joining the party

and setting the tone of mashup hits to create the biggest party on the Atlantic! If you're

looking for an excuse to go out, please join us this June for a party that promises to be

the benchmark for all your summer events. Reserve your tickets today!!



When: Friday June 19, 2009
Pick up tickets: 7-8pm
Cruise Time: 9pm-12am

$20 using the link below!!! $25 if you don't....!

https://www.paypal.co...

What to Wear: Your best Hawaiian Outfit!!

For more info: www.bostonluau.com
item.how_to_find_us: I can't go! But I'll help organize a time/place to meet if you'd like!!
item.name: Boston Luau Booze Cruise! Discount Tix
